snippet: A federal appeals court heard arguments over whether banning “conversion therapy” for minors is an infringement on free speech or a valid effort to prevent malpractice.
abstract: Federal appeals court in San Francisco hears arguments over whether California law banning gay 'conversion therapy' for minors is unjustified infringement on free speech or valid effort to prevent therapeutic malpractice.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court heard arguments over whether banning “conversion therapy” for minors is an infringement on free speech or a valid effort to prevent malpractice.

headline.seo: Day in Court for California Law Banning ‘Conversion Therapy’
